Name: Pop My Cherry
Ingredients: 15 ml Disaronno amaretto infused with vanilla
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: A crowd-pleasing cherry and almond dessert-style cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Sarah Mason, United Kingdom.
Nutrition: One serving of Pop My Cherry contains 243 calories
